Utterance: Ami tomake ekta test dicchi je tomar bichar o memory ke matiye ney. Tumi tai korbe?
Tobe, jodi tomar kono prosno thake, oti sundor hoto. R joto tuku uttar dite paro, ta bhalo hoto.
Tumi bolte paro ki kono season?
Tumi bolte paro ki, amra ei building e achi, ei building er naam ki?
George, ami tomake bolchilam kichu object amay phire bolte. Ball, flag, tree. Tader phire bolte paro?
Ami chai tumi 100 theke shuru kore sat e ghate kore gulo bolte thako. Ami bole dibo jokhon thamte hobe. Shuru koro.
Bhalo, George. Dhonnobad. Ami chai tumi "world" er spelling ta ulte bolte.
Tumi mone koro, ami tomar kache ek minute age ki kichu bolchilam?
Aar tumi bolte paro ki eita ki?
Ami tomake ekta phrase bolbo, tumi tar pori repeat korte paro. Ota holo "no ifs, ands, or buts."
Ami chai tomake ei kagaj ta right hat e niye, tate tate kagaj ta duto kore phelte r darun kore floor e rakhte.
Dhonnobad. George, tomar chair er bame ekta clipboard ache. Tumi seta tule nao.
Dhonnobad, George. Ekhon sei kagaj er upore, tomake sei chobi dekhte hobe. To dekhte parcho?
Dhonnobad, George. Ei khub upokar hoyeche. Ami tomake ei jonno dhonnobad janai.
